revised_title: Comets and the Origin of Planetary Systems
tldr: This article discusses the importance of comets in understanding the origin of the Solar System. It explores the possibility that comets originated from satellite nebulae or nearby fragments of the same parent interstellar cloud. The author also presents a scheme for the formation of cometesimals, which is consistent with current knowledge of the contraction of a rotating magnetized fragment of an interstellar cloud.
